model.classes

Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.classes.Hand

  • public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
    CS252 Object-Oriented Programming
    Hand Class. Represents the Hand of a player. Contains his train cards, destination cards and big city cards he has claimed.
    Author:
    George Kokiadis csd3962@csd.uoc.gr

      • addCard

        void addCard(Card c)
        Adds the given card to the correct List.
        Pre Conditions : Card c is a valid card
        Post Conditions : Card is added in the hand, in the appropriate place.
        Parameters:
        c - Card to be added

      • removeCard

        void removeCard(Card c)
         throws CardNotFoundException
        Removes the given card from the correct list.
        Pre Conditions : Card c is a valid and existing card
        Post Conditions : Remove the card from the correct place.
        Parameters:
        c - Card to be removed
        Throws:
        CardNotFoundException - Thrown when c is not a valid card
